field.name: summary
field.value: Problem with colorizer with multiple files open

field.name: description
field.value:
Opening multiple NVelocity files in the same instance of Visual Studio will cause the files to overwrite the same scanner state causing the colourising to work incorrectly.
Workarounds: - When changing files press Ctrl+A to select all the text in the file, this causes Visual Studio to rescan the whole file, which will replace the scanner state with the current file's state information. - Run multiple instances of Visual Studio with a single file in each instance.
